pinyin: tu2 xing2 yong4 hu4 jie4 mian4

definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: You can display these statistics graphically through the user interface described below.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過下面描述的圖形用戶界面顯示這些統計數據。

sentences.english: You can retrieve the same results using the graphical user interface.
sentences.chinese: 使用圖形用戶界面，您可以檢索到同樣的結果。

sentences.english: The second package is not platform-dependent and provides a graphical user interface.
sentences.chinese: 第二個包與平臺無關，並提供了圖形用戶界面。
